title: Amy Schumer, Jessica Simpson joke about post-baby weight loss
text:
Amy Schumer is in no rush to lose her baby weight and she's letting the world know it.

The comedian and actress took to Instagram Monday to post about losing 10 pounds after the birth of her baby, Gene, earlier this year.

She also poked a joke at fellow mom Jessica Simpson, who revealed in a post last week that she dropped 100 pounds in just six months.

"Ok Simpson! Well ive lost 10 pounds and 100 dollars to my sister playing poker. #norush #givememymoneybackkim," Schumer wrote in her photo caption.

Simpson saw the post and commented right back, supporting her fellow mom and saying women should lose weight at their own pace.

"You’re hot. Size only matters when it comes to men," she wrote.

"Yes, I tipped the scales at 240," Simpson candidly wrote in her post. "My first trip away from #BIRDIEMAE and emotional for many reasons, but so proud to feel like myself again. Even when it felt impossible, I chose to work harder."

Many fans and friends commented about the hard work and supported the singer and fashion mogul.

Actress January Jones added, "Wowza lady, you look [hot]."

Simpson had given birth to her youngest daughter, Birdie Mae, in March.
description: Amy Schumer is in no rush to lose her baby weight and letting the world know it.
